Logout.title: Logout
Logout.steps: You can logout using the button below. Doing so will end your current session.
Logout.impact: You'll need to login again next time you want to access your account. But in the meantime your account will be protected from access by anyone else with access to this device.

Register.title: Sign up
Register.name: Name
Register.nameDescription: Use your real name here to help ensure your email alerts dont't end up in your spam folder.
Register.companyCodeDescription: Search Google for the word 'organisationsnummer' alongside the name of the company and it'll usually be among the top results
Register.companyCodeInvalid: A company ID is always six digits and four digits with a hyphen in between, like 000000-0000.
Register.emailDescription: 666a is an email alert service so it's not much use without your email address!
Register.passwordDescription: Please just let your password manager create one instead of reusing one.

Hero.stopWorrying: Stop worrying how long since you last remembered to check. Start hearing about new documents as soon as they're filed.

Dashboard.title: Welcome Back
Dashboard.subscription: You're subscribed to email alerts for company ID {companyCode}. Email henry@catalinismith.com if you need to change to another company ID
